channel.title: Statixos on Pranaya Deomani
channel.description: Recent content in Statixos on Pranaya Deomani

item.title: StatiXOS v7.12 for Xiaomi Redmi Pad (yunluo)
item.description:
StatiXOS is an aftermarket homebrew distribution of Android aiming to be minimal while providing quality of life improvements and up to date security patches.

Changelog

2024-09-13

Device side:

  • Merged September 2024 ASB into kernel
  • Fixed occasional media playback issues
  • Fixed USB audio playback

Source side:

  • September 2024 ASB
  • Fixed Play Integrity once again
2024-08-08

Device side:

  • Merged August 2024 ASB into kernel
  • Update proprietary blobs and firmware to OS1.0.4.0.ULYMIXM

Source side:
